pages.title: Sappire Vein
pages.text: Sappire Vein has a high reserve of sappire ores

Main Ore:Sappire$(br)Associated Ores:Indicolite, Blue Topaz, Iolite$(br2)Heights:10-20$(br2)Vein Spreadth:Medium$(br)Vein Density:Medium$(br2)Indicator:Blue Topaz Glow Rose$(br)Vein Rarity:Rare$(br2)Dimension:Overworld
